title: Built-in scorers: exactMatch, contains, llmJudge
acceptance_criteria: exactMatch() scorer - compares output to expected exactly
contains() scorer - checks if output contains expected substring(s)
llmJudge() scorer - uses LLM to evaluate quality with configurable criteria
All scorers return consistent ScoreResult format (value 0-1, reason string)
Scorers are well-typed with TypeScript generics where appropriate
Unit tests cover edge cases (empty strings, null handling, etc.)
